Key.description: A valid security key in PEM format.
Key.markdownDescription:
A valid security key in PEM format.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption

InstanceId.markdownDescription:
Amazon Connect instance identifier

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:connect:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:instance/[-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

AssociationId.description: An associationID is automatically generated when a storage config is associated with an instance
AssociationId.markdownDescription:
An associationID is automatically generated when a storage config is associated with an instance

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: ^[-a-z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption
